synopsis.text: Mob and his colleagues from the Spirits and Such Consultation Office embark on a well-deserved vacation to the tranquil Ibogami Hot Springs in Zebra Prefecture. However, this trip isn't entirely leisurely, as they're tasked with investigating peculiar rumors surrounding the inn. As they journey towards their destination, Reigen and the newest team member, Serizawa, find themselves unwillingly transported to an uncanny parallel realm. Will they manage to escape this supernatural predicament and still enjoy their holiday? This bonus episode aired at an anime event in Saitama Prefecture on July 7th, 2019.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
